header.heading: My
header.subtitle: Flexible personal training and online coaching to help you train, progress, and succeed.

cards.title: Personal Training
cards.desc: Face-to-face sessions at Iron HQ (Bingham), Frontline Fitness (Grantham), or a location that works for you. Every session is tailored to your goals, abilities, and schedule.

cards.title: Online Coaching
cards.desc: Can't train in person? No problem. I'll build you a custom programme delivered through the Hevy app, with weekly check-ins and ongoing support.

what_to_expect.heading: What to Expect
what_to_expect.body: Your first session starts with a chat about your goals, your background, and what you want to get out of training. I'll assess your movement patterns and build a programme from there â€” no cookie-cutter plans, no one-size-fits-all.

hevy.heading: Hevy Pro â€” Your Training Companion
hevy.highlight_body: All my clients receive Hevy Pro â€” a powerful workout tracking app that lets you log every session, track your progress over time, and follow your personalised programme. Think of it as me in your pocket between sessions.

items.question: Do I need to be fit to start?
items.answer: Absolutely not. I work with people of all fitness levels, from complete beginners to experienced athletes. Every programme is built around where you are right now.

items.question: How often should I train?
items.answer: That depends on your goals and lifestyle. Most of my clients train 2-3 times per week, but I'll work with you to find a sustainable schedule that fits your life.

items.question: Can I bring a friend?
items.answer: Yes! Small group sessions (2-3 people) are available at a reduced per-person rate. Training with a mate can be a great motivator.

cta.heading: Ready to Get Started?
cta.body: Drop me a message to discuss your goals and book your first session.
